original_text: But as one was felling a beam, the axe head fell into the water: and he cried, and said, Alas, master! for it was borrowed.
korean_text: 한 사람이 나무를 벨 때에 쇠도끼가 물에 떨어진지라 이에 외쳐 이르되 아아, 내 주여 이는 빌려온 것이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: But as one was felling a beam
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 어떤 사람이 들보를 찍어 내리는데

sentences.original_text: the axe head fell into the water
